markdownRemark.html:
I planned to call this article “Make webpack bundle your code faster in dev”. But to be really honest, this is an absolutely bonkers way to ruin your life. Don’t do it. Read the article and ruminate on how lucky you are to not have to deal with this.

Moving on.

Webpacks dev server is nice. It’s snappy, doesn’t need a page reload most of the time and is in general something I worry about when writing a project created with Vue CLI. Fast forward a couple of years and the project has now grown is now huge. Developer experience is horrible with reload taking more than 20s.
